subject: Re: Order #SSN1547 confirmed
description_text:
Hi,

I have a problem with my Order
SSN1547
That I made in May.

However I seem to be missing the mounting brackets for the Vibration
motors. I got the box with only those Vibration modules and have nothing to
mount them on my pedals.

The box had a space where they should be in I guess but they were NOT in
the box.

Can you please send me the missing brackets?

Thank you in advance
Tony Richter

Address:

Germany
Tony Richter
Augustusburger Str. 400
09127 Chemnitz

conversations.body_text: Hi Tony Richter,  Sorry, the vibration module purchased separately does not come with mounting brackets. However, we did not make it clear, so we will reissue it for you and you only need to pay $9.9 for shipping. Is that ok?

Hi!

Thanks for the quick answer.

That would be ok for me. If you can send me the brackets and screws for 10$
I'm happy.

Greetings
Tony


service@simsonn.com
Hi Tony Richter, You can click this link to make the payment, thank you for your understanding. https://www.simsonn.com/products/difference
Hi Tony Richter,     This is your logistics tracking link. https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6045821026944
